question: UJerry unomhlambi weenkukhu. Iinkukhu ezibomvu zivelisa amaqanda ama3 ngemini, kwaye ezimhlophe zivelisa amaqanga ama5 ngemini. Yonke imihla uJerry uqokolela  amaqanda angam42. Ukuba uneenkukhu ezimbini kunezibomvu iinkukhu, zingaphi iinkukhu ezibomvu anazo?

<eos>
<|assistant|>
Mholo, ndiyavuya ukukunceda. Ukuba uJerry unomhlambi weenkukhu kwaye usebenzisa iinkukhu ezimbini kunezibomvu, sinokubala ngolu hlobo: Ukuba iinkukhu ezibomvu zivelisa amaqanda ama3 ngemini kwaye iinkukhu ezimhlophe zivelisa amaqanga ama5 ngemini, kwaye uJerry uqokolela amaqanda angam42, masithi:

Amagqabantshintshi amabini (iinkukhu ezibomvu nezimhlophe) anokubakho:
42 / 3 (amaqanda eziqokolelwe yiinkukhu ezibomvu) + 42 / 5 (amaqanga eziqokolelwe yiinkukhu ezimhlophe) = inani leenkokheli ezimbini.

Ukwenza igalelo leenkukhu ezimbini kunezibomvu, singabala ngolu hlobo:
Inani leenkokheli ezimbini = 42 / (3 + 5) = 42 / 8 = 5.25.

Noko ke, xa sithetha ngeenkokheli, sihlala sithetha ngamanani apheleleyo, hayi amagqabantshintshi anokuba yi-5.25. Ngoko ke, uJerry uyakuba nentloko enye yebomvu nezinye eziyi-6 ezimhlophe, ukuba sithetha ngamanani apheleleyo.
